articles.description: The 52-year-old Mayor Of Kingstown actor shared a time-lapse video updating fans on the progress he has made in physical therapy since his near-fatal snowplow accident earlier this year.
articles.content:
Jeremy Renner posted another social media update on his recovery on Saturday.
The 52-year-old Mayor Of Kingstown actor shared a time-lapse video updating fans on the progress he has made in physical… [+5525 chars]
